title: Kirti - MBA Portfolio
text:
Toggle Dark Mode




Hi, I’m Kirti


An MBA student blending data, education, and technology.



🎯 About Me
I’m an MBA student with a strong foundation in STEM and over four years of international teaching experience. Currently, I work as the Assistant Centre Director at Mathnasium West Vancouver, where I lead instructional strategy, team operations, and customer engagement. I’m deeply interested in data analysis, educational innovation, and digital transformation, and I’m actively exploring roles where I can combine technical, teaching, and business knowledge to solve meaningful problems.


🎓 Education
Master of Business Administration
University Canada West | 2024 – Present
Master of Science (Zoology)
Punjabi University, Patiala, India | 2018 – 2020
Bachelor of Science (Bioinformatics)
Guru Nanak Dev University, Amritsar, India | 2015 – 2018


💼 Experience
Assistant Centre Director
Mathnasium of West Vancouver | May 2024 – Present
- Manage day-to-day centre operations and lead the instructional team
- Provide high-quality customer support and sales consultation to families
- Support the Centre Director in planning, scheduling, and performance tracking
- Drive collaboration and team culture to ensure student success
Programming & Math Instructor
WhiteHat Jr. | Aug 2020 – Feb 2024
- Delivered 1:1 and small group programming lessons to students globally (Grades 4–10)
- Taught real-world projects involving games, websites, apps, data science, VR/AR, and cybersecurity
- Conducted interactive and story-based math sessions for Grades 7–8
- Taught students from diverse regions including the US, UK, Canada, Australia, and more


🧠 Skills

Technical: Python, JavaScript, HTML/CSS, React Native, jQuery, AFRAME

Education-Focused: Curriculum delivery, instructional design, student engagement

Business: Leadership, operations, sales, team management, CRM

Languages: English (Fluent)
